title: Can u wind up q flash on thresh and still hit.
body:
I was wondering whether you can wind up a thresh q then flash and still have it go out at the same angle?
Thx
Minpin

replies.body:
There are a multitude of channeled abilities you can flash with to increase range though.

Vi's Q you can flash and release to hit somebody pretty far away.
Varus's Q you can do the same thing.
Flash will only ever go off when you finish your Q animation (just tried this in a custom.)
Damn I saw some Madlife plays :({{champion:412}}

Unfortunately they patched that, i believe it was with the Blitzcrank/Thresh patch to make sure you can't pull people a really long distance, and in doing so they made the Q's a root for both of them.
You used to be able to do this but they patched it a long time ago.
